entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
